about.subtitle: Discover authentic Suriname
about.title: Experience the untouched rainforest with Jungle Resort PingPe
about.description: We are dedicated to providing authentic eco-tourism experiences that connect you with Suriname's pristine rainforest while supporting local communities. Our expert guides, deep local knowledge, and commitment to sustainable tourism ensure unforgettable adventures that respect both nature and culture.
about.mission: Our mission is to create transformative jungle experiences that foster deep connections with nature while supporting indigenous communities and preserving Suriname's precious rainforest ecosystem.
about.sustainability: We practice responsible tourism by limiting group sizes, using local guides, and ensuring that tourism revenue directly benefits the communities we visit.
about.community: Our partnerships with Saramaccan, Aucan, and Wayana communities create authentic cultural exchanges that respect traditional ways of life.

marcus.name: Marcus Amafo
marcus.description: With 15+ years of rainforest guiding experience, Marcus leads our most challenging expeditions with unmatched knowledge of wildlife behavior and jungle survival.

sarina.name: Sarina Kajaman
sarina.description: Sarina bridges cultures with her deep understanding of indigenous traditions and 10+ years of experience facilitating respectful community interactions.

robert.name: Robert Tjoe
robert.description: Robert ensures every expedition runs smoothly and safely, bringing 12+ years of expedition management experience to every tour.

melanie.name: Melanie Pawiroredjo
melanie.description: Melanie develops and maintains our community partnerships, ensuring tourism benefits local families while respecting traditional lifestyles.
